name: Erekor's Asteroids
description:
Play the game and navigate menus using the arrow keys and space to select/shoot.

This free game is a testament to the original but with considerably better graphics.

I have spent a lot of time working on this so I hope you enjoy playing this nostalgia filled game.

And yes I know that I am bad at writing descriptions.

Version 1.6 Patch Notes

-Background Music has been added but is still being worked on

Version 1.5 Patch Notes

-INSANE Difficulty has been Added
-Collision should be a bit better now
-Menu Pointer is now the Ship you play as
-Game Icon is now the ship you play as
